name: Smith & Wesson CSX
description: A compact, metal-framed 9mm pistol combining classic 1911-style features with modern ergonomics, designed for concealed carry and reliability.

name: HK CC9
description: A micro-compact, double-stack 9mm pistol from Heckler & Koch, built for concealed carry with optics-ready capability, ambidextrous controls, and rugged NATO-tested durability.

name: Canik TTI Combat
description: A full-size 9mm pistol built with Taran Tactical Innovations, featuring a compensator, flat-faced trigger, optic-ready slide, and enhanced ergonomics for performance shooting.

name: Smith & Wesson FPC
description: A folding 9mm pistol-caliber rifle designed for compact carry, using pistol magazines, with optics and suppressor-ready features.

name: Zastava M70 ZPAP
description: A durable 39mm semi-auto rifle with an AK-style design, known for reliability and military heritage.

name: Rock Island VR80
description: A 12-gauge semi-auto shotgun with AR-style design, 20 inch barrel, and durable burnt bronze finish.

name: Beretta 92XI
description: A modern 9mm pistol with single-action trigger, 18+1 capacity, optics-ready, and Vertec-style grip.

name: POF Phoenix
description: A compact 9mm AR-style pistol with an 8.5 inch barrel, 35-round mag, and ambidextrous controls.

name: Hex
description: A modern semi-automatic handgun built for precision, reliability, and control, featuring a durable frame, ergonomic grip, and sleek, angular design.
